gui.dragonlite.compass.error: Error, you should never see this!
screen.dragonlite.config.title: General
screen.dragonlite.compass_config.title: Compass
option.dragonlite.config.light_level_squ: Adjusts the size of the squares that render on each block.
option.dragonlite.config.enable_smokey_f: Makes any furnace block (Furnace, Blast Furnace and Smoker) emit more particles.
option.dragonlite.config.compass_gap.too: The pixel gap between each coordinate and direction.
option.dragonlite.config.durability_tool: Shows the item's durability on the tooltip. Shows tools effective durability with Unbreaking and flight time with Elytra's.
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.bad_omen: Causes an ominous event upon entering a village or the trial chambers
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.blindness: Impairs vision and disables the ability to sprint and critical hit
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.conduit_power: Increases underwater visibility and mining speed, prevents drowning
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.darkness: Adds a darkening affect to the players screen and black fog
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.fire_resistanc: Prevents the affected entity from taking any fire and lava damage
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.glowing: Outlines the affected entity even through blocks
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.haste: Increases attack speed by %s%% and mining speed by %s%%
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.hero_of_the_vi: Gives %s%% discounts on trades with villagers, and villagers throw items at the player
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.hunger: Increases food exhaustion by %s per second
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.infested: Entities have a 10% chance to spawn 1-3 silverfish when hurt
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.invisibility: Affected entity is invisible and reduces other mobs' detection range
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.jump_boost: Increase jump height to %s, reduces fall damage by +%s♥
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.levitation: Entities float upwards at %s per second
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.luck: Increases chances of better and more loot from fishing and chests
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.mining_fatigue: Decreases attack speed by %s%% and mining speed by %s%%
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.nausea: Wobbles and warps the screen, and increasingly gets worse
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.night_vision: Lets the player see well in darkness and underwater
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.oozing: Makes the entity spawn 2 slimes upon death
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.poison: Inflicts %s♥ per second, doesn't affect undead. Damage is none lethal
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.raid_omen: Starts a raid at the location the player gained the Raid Omen, once the effect expires
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.saturation: Replenishes %s food and %s saturation each tick applied
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.slow_falling: Decreases falling speed and negates fall damage
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.trial_omen: Transforms nearby trial spawners into ominous trial spawners
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.unluck: Reduces chances of better and more loot from fishing and chests
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.water_breathin: Prevents drowning and lets the affected entity breathe underwater
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.weaving: Affected entities spread cobweb blocks upon death
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.wind_charged: Affected entities emit a burst of wind upon death
tooltip.dragonlite.effect.wither: Inflicts %s♥ per second, doesn't affect undead
